QuestData.Title: Study Hall: Combat Research
QuestData.Description: What's this? A new, confused student, desperately trying to win the favor of the headmistress, wandering the halls without anything to do?$b$bPerfect! I need help with my research.$b$bI'm writing a paper on combat. Grab me some books from the shelf over there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the books that Sythorne requests, then help him defeat the challenges within.
QuestData.CompletionText: I agree. Research can be grueling work.
QuestData.RewardText: My hand is beginning to tire from taking so many notes. I think it's time we took a break.
